snippet: The Bukharian kosher restaurant with a vast array of kebabs has a birthday ritual, including pulsing green strobes, that transforms the dining room.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Salute, restaurant in Forest Hills, Queens, that caters to Central Asian Jews.
lead_paragraph: The Bukharian kosher restaurant with a vast array of kebabs has a birthday ritual, including pulsing green strobes, that transforms the dining room.

headline.main: The 30-Second Silk Road Disco Party at Salute
